article.title: BAE Receives Contract for Worldwide 5
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is awarding a contract to BAE Systems for a maximum of $50 million. This action will provide systems engineering and evaluation and systems analysis for Worldwide 5. This work will provide life-cycle software development engineering to the U.S. Defense Department Intelligence Information System and the U.S. Intelligence Community worldwide.
